title: Flipped Learning-Based Program for Enhancing Learning Outcomes in Science for Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Project-based flipped learning program for vocational high school graduates to strengthen science-related job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can apply scientific theories and experimental techniques with over 90% accuracy via the flipped learning model.
Learners can demonstrate problem-solving skills required in real-world professional settings through project-based assessments.

Learners will use personal devices (tablet, laptop) to create a 2-week learning plan and participate in one team project using collaboration tools (Google Docs/Notion), submitting ≥3 peer evaluation reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
